sops.title: New Repository Bootstrap
sops.description: Steps to create a new repository from infinity-templates and apply branch protection.
steps: Set required secrets: ADMIN_PLANE_PAT, GOOGLE_SERVICE_ACCOUNT_JSON, VAULT_ADDR, VAULT_TOKEN, MESH_HOOK_URL
Verify all workflows pass on first PR

sops.title: State Advancement
sops.description: How to manually advance repository state when automation cannot.
steps: Edit singularity/_STATE/state.json with the new 'next' value
Open a PR — state-machine workflow will validate the transition

sops.title: Emergency Hotfix
sops.description: Process for applying an emergency hotfix bypassing normal flow.
steps: Merge — admin-sync and release workflows handle the rest
